steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the location where you want to insert the bookmark.
Select the text or object that you want to bookmark.
Go to the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Bookmark' button in the 'Links' group.
In the 'Bookmark' dialog box, enter a name for the bookmark.
Click the 'Add' button to create the bookmark.
The bookmark is now inserted at the selected location in the document.
